## buildExtensionManagerUrl() function

Builds the URL for fetching extensions from the Extension Manager service

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function buildExtensionManagerUrl(config: ExtensionManagerConfig): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | [ExtensionManagerConfig](./uix-host-react.extensionmanagerconfig.md) | the Extension Manager configuration |

**Returns:**

string

the URL for fetching extensions
